# Changelog

All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

The format is based on [Keep a Changelog](https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.0.0/),
and this project adheres to [Semantic Versioning](https://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html).

## [0.0.3] - 2025-10-16

#### 🚀 Features
- Improve gphoto information scraper stability and error handling ([#10](https://github.com/burgdev/immichporter/pull/10))
- Add suport to create users and albums in immich ([#8](https://github.com/burgdev/immichporter/pull/8))

#### 🐛 Fixes
- Fix add user bug ([#10](https://github.com/burgdev/immichporter/pull/10))
- Fix drop tables ([#7](https://github.com/burgdev/immichporter/pull/7))
